{"blocks":[{"key":"fh0gj","text":"Circle tissue on slide using a hydrophobic ImmEdgeTM PAP pen (Vector laboratories) to contain\nsolution.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":50,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bl6gm","text":"Prepare 1:500 pFTAA solution (diluted in PBS). All steps from here should be performed away from light.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":47,"length":56}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8fqdl","text":"Pipette pFTAA solution onto tissue and incubate at room temperature in a humidified chamber for  mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":96,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6k546","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"fdvdq","text":"Breathing in xylene vapours in the air can cause irritation to the eyes, nose and throat and it can cause irritation, redness and swelling to the skin or eyes; and headaches, dizziness, vertigo and drowsiness. Please work to your institution approved health \u0026 safety policies, risk assessments and local procedures for the safe use, storage and disposal or xylene.  Refer to the data safety sheet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bm48","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
